complaint_text:
I purchased a health insurance plan last month but my claim for hospitalization was denied without proper explanation. 
The customer support team has not responded to my emails for over a week. 
This is extremely frustrating and I would like an immediate resolution.
response_draft:
Subject: Re: Denied Claim and Unresponsive Support

Dear [Customer's Name],

I apologize for the frustration and inconvenience caused by the delayed response to your emails and the denied claim for hospitalization. 

You had purchased a health insurance plan with us last month and your claim for hospitalization was denied without a proper explanation.

I'm here to help resolve this issue promptly. To investigate this matter further, I would like to request that you please reply to this email with your claim reference number and a brief summary of your hospitalization expenses. 

I will also escalate this case to our claims department and ensure that you receive a detailed explanation for the denial. You can expect a response from me within the next 48 hours.

Please feel free to contact me directly at [Support Email] or [Support Phone Number] if you have any further questions or concerns.

Thank you for your patience and cooperation.

Best regards,
[Your Name]
Customer Support Agent
